title: Update k9 base code to version 5.208
body:
Hi,
since this fork appears not to be updated any more, I decided to try and update the underlying k-9 code to (at least) version 5.208, which includes some doze-related fixes.

I don't really know what I am doing, so please feel free to correct if I did something wrong / nonsensical. But at least on my computer the apk builds and it runs on my phone, so it seems that I must have done something right.

title: swap read/unread colors
body:
So, I fired Android Studio up and used my rusty Android skills to patch #27 myself.

This fixes #27 by solely swapping the unread/read status background colors.

title: Change app name and change notice
body: The license does not require us to add "(unofficial)" or anything related to that and it makes the app name unnecessarily long in most launchers.

title: Update colors.xml
body: Added value to expose hard coded values
